title: saamagaana lOla
sahitya:
sAmagAnalOla sadbhakti tandaruL vaDivEla sakalAgama mUla



anupallavi



kAmamAdi aru paghaiyara pOkki samatamAdi sAdanangaL uNDAkki



caraNam



attar nutarkkaN arulvArkku ughanda  pAri citrAmbari gauri tandaruL puri
 bhakti mighu kavi kunjaradAsa paripAla shIla karuNAlavAla bAla
